HeroHome.name: Torcoroma Arias
HeroHome.role: Frontend Developer specialized in creating exceptional digital experiences with React, Next.js and TypeScript.

AboutSection.title: About Me
AboutSection.paragraph1: Frontend Developer with experience in real projects, including freelance work. Specialized in creating responsive interfaces with React.js, Next.js and TypeScript, plus experience in WordPress and PHP.
AboutSection.paragraph2: I also have experience in frontend-backend integration and basic knowledge in creating endpoints with Node.js and Express.
